body.title: How does the SPFE Open Toolkit work?
body.p: The SPFE Open Toolkit is a system for transforming structured content XML to produce output in a desired format. It works by applying XSLT scripts to process source XML through a series of steps to produce the output.

li.p: The synthesis stage collects source topic sets, pulling content together to prepare it for further processing.
The presentation stage organizes and links topics, structuring content as needed for a particular output format.
The formatting stage produces an XML representation of the format. If the output format is an XML format, such as XHTML, this will be the final stage.
The encoding stage tranforms the XML representation to the output format when that format, such as PDF, is not XML.
